content.question: Ms. Harper knows that her students in a computing course can choose from one of three operating systems for the semester: Doors, Banana, or Duix. Ms. Harper wants to test the hypothesis that her students will select the operating systems in the same proportion as students in other computing courses at the university. She conducts a <math alttext="chi square" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>χ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> goodness-of-fit test and calculates <math alttext="chi square equals 3.79" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>χ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3.79</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> with a corresponding <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-value of 0.15. Which of the following is correct at a 5-percent level of significance?

choices.label: Reject the null hypothesis, since <math alttext="3.79 is greater than 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.79</mn><mo>></mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Fail to reject the null hypothesis, since <math alttext="3.79 is greater than 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.79</mn><mo>></mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Reject the null hypothesis, since <math alttext="0.15 is greater than 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.15</mn><mo>></mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Fail to reject the null hypothesis, since <math alttext="0.15 is greater than 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.15</mn><mo>></mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Reject the null hypothesis, since <math alttext="0.15 is less than 3.79" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.15</mn><mo><</mo><mn>3.79</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: Fail to reject the null hypothesis, since <math alttext="0.15 is greater than 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.15</mn><mo>></mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

topic.text: 8.3: Carrying out a Chi-Square Goodness of Fit Test

skill.text: Skill 4.E: Justify a claim using a decision based on significance tests.
